sourcesContent:
<template>
  <canvas id="c" @click="test"></canvas>
  <button @click="test">test</button>
</template>

<script>
import image from "./ressources/planIUT.png";
import { fabric } from "fabric";

let canva = null;
export default {
  emits: ["myCanva"],
  mounted() {
    var canvas = new fabric.Canvas("c");

    fabric.Image.fromURL(image, function (oImg) {
      canvas.setDimensions({ width: oImg.width, height: oImg.height });
      var circle = new fabric.Circle({
        radius: 20,
        fill: "green",
        left: 100,
        top: 100,
      });
      canvas.setBackgroundImage(oImg);
      canvas.add(circle);
    });
    // Zoom du site de fabric
    canvas.on("mouse:wheel", function (opt) {
      var delta = opt.e.deltaY;
      var zoom = canvas.getZoom();
      zoom *= 0.999 ** delta;
      if (zoom > 20) zoom = 20;
      if (zoom < 0.01) zoom = 0.01;
      canvas.setZoom(zoom);
      opt.e.preventDefault();
      opt.e.stopPropagation();
    });
    canvas.width = 500;
    canva = canvas;
    this.$emit("myCanva", canvas);
  },
  methods: {
    getPos(image) {
      console.log(this.$refs.image.getBoundingClientRect().left);
      console.log(this.$refs.image.getBoundingClientRect().top);
    },
    test() {
      console.log(canva.item(1).center());
    },
    getMouseCoords(event) {
      var pointer = canva.getPointer(event.e);
      var posX = pointer.x;
      var posY = pointer.y;
      console.log(posX + ", " + posY); // Log to console
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      image: image,
    };
  },
};
</script>
